properties.name: minio.url
properties.description: The URL of the MinIO server. This should include the hostname or IP address where MinIO is running.

properties.name: minio.port
properties.description: The port on which the MinIO server is running. Default MinIO port is 9000 for HTTP and 9001 for HTTPS.

properties.name: minio.secure
properties.description: A flag to determine if the connection to the MinIO server is secure (HTTPS) or not (HTTP). Set to true for HTTPS and false for HTTP.

properties.name: minio.access-key
properties.description: The access key used for authentication with the MinIO server. This acts like a username to access the server.

properties.name: minio.secret-key
properties.description: The secret key used for authentication with the MinIO server. This acts like a password to access the server.

properties.name: minio.pool.size
properties.description: The maximum number of connections that can be pooled and reused to improve performance and reduce latency.

properties.name: minio.pool.keep-alive
properties.description: The amount of time (in seconds) that idle connections in the pool are kept alive before they are closed.

properties.name: minio.pool.keep-alive-time-unit
properties.description: The time unit for the keep-alive setting of the connection pool. Options include time units such as SECONDS, MINUTES, or HOURS.

properties.name: minio.default-bucket-name
properties.description: The default bucket name where files will be stored in the MinIO server if no other bucket is specified.

properties.name: application.cache.enable
properties.description: A flag to determine if cache is enable.

properties.name: application.cache.type
properties.description: The type of data structure to cache. Should be 'TIRE' or 'LRU'.
